checks.name: Backup Policy Alignment with Recovery Objectives
checks.description: System backup policies should be aligned with defined RTO and RPO objectives for effective recovery

testResults.details: 97.2% alignment coverage with backup frequencies exceeding RPO requirements
Geo-replication enabled with automated failover and RTO-based region selection
Business-aligned scheduling with automated retention policy management

checks.remediation: Backup policies comprehensively aligned with recovery objectives with strong cross-region strategy and automated retention management

checks.name: Automated Backup Success Monitoring
checks.description: Backup operations should be continuously monitored with automated success validation and failure alerting

testResults.test: Backup monitoring coverage and automation assessment
testResults.details: 100% monitoring coverage with 98.7% success rate and automated integrity validation

testResults.test: Alerting and escalation system effectiveness evaluation
testResults.details: Multi-channel alerting with < 15 minute response time and intelligent filtering

testResults.test: Predictive analytics and proactive monitoring validation
testResults.details: AI-driven failure prediction with anomaly detection and proactive intervention

checks.remediation: Backup monitoring comprehensively implemented with advanced predictive analytics and proactive intervention capabilities

checks.name: Backup Storage and Data Integrity Validation
checks.description: Backup storage should ensure data integrity with comprehensive validation and verification procedures

testResults.test: Storage integrity and validation procedure assessment
testResults.details: Geo-redundant storage with AES-256 encryption and continuous integrity monitoring

testResults.test: Data validation and restore testing effectiveness
testResults.details: Weekly test restores with 97.3% validation success and automated verification

testResults.test: Access control and security implementation validation
testResults.details: Role-based access with MFA, privileged access management, and automated security auditing

checks.remediation: Backup storage and data integrity comprehensively implemented with robust security and automated validation procedures

checks.name: Limited Backup Testing and Restore Validation
checks.description: Backup systems lack comprehensive testing and restore validation to ensure recovery capability effectiveness

testResults.test: Restore testing coverage and frequency assessment
testResults.details: 51.5% system coverage with monthly frequency vs recommended weekly testing
Partial automation with manual validation and static test data generation

testResults.test: Business continuity integration and stakeholder involvement
testResults.details: No BCP integrated testing or business process validation testing

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Increase restore testing coverage to 100% with weekly frequency and comprehensive scope, 2) Implement full testing automation with dynamic test data generation and automated validation, 3) Establish performance and scalability testing for large databases and concurrent operations, 4) Integrate business continuity testing with stakeholder involvement and business process validation, 5) Create comprehensive testing analytics with trend analysis and improvement recommendations, 6) Develop automated test environment provisioning with realistic data and configuration management

checks.name: Insufficient Backup Recovery Documentation and Procedures
checks.description: Backup recovery procedures lack comprehensive documentation and standardized processes for effective restoration

testResults.test: Recovery procedure documentation coverage and completeness
testResults.details: 53.8% coverage with high-level instructions and limited scenario documentation
Variable procedures across systems with minimal troubleshooting guidance

testResults.test: Stakeholder accessibility and training material availability
testResults.details: IT team access only with no role-based documentation or training materials

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Achieve 100% recovery procedure documentation coverage with detailed step-by-step instructions and comprehensive scenario coverage, 2) Implement standardized procedure templates with consistent formatting and troubleshooting guidance, 3) Develop role-based recovery documentation with stakeholder-specific procedures and training materials, 4) Establish systematic procedure validation and maintenance processes with effectiveness metrics, 5) Create mobile-accessible emergency procedures with offline availability capabilities, 6) Integrate automated recovery procedures with comprehensive tool-specific guidance and self-service capabilities
